Title: Doctor Behind Award-Winning Parkinson’s Research Among Scientists Purged From NIH
Description: Leading scientists at the National Institutes of Health, the US’s leading medical research agency, were swept up Tuesday in the Trump administration's latest firing blitz.

Title: Netflix will offer more languages for subtitles and dubbing when watching on a TV
Description:
If you’re watching Netflix shows and movies on a TV, the streaming service will now offer many more language options for subtitles and dubbing.
Starting today, you’ll be able to “pick from the full list of available languages for any title when watching Netf…

Title: Google's plan to steal ChatGPT's market share is all about Gemini's free tier
Description:
Gemini 2.5 Pro experimental is becoming available to free users less than a week after it was announced.
What does that tell us about Google's AI strategy?

Title: Val Kilmer, 'Top Gun' and Batman star with an intense approach, dies at 65
Description:
Val Kilmer died from pneumonia.
He had recovered after a 2014 throat cancer diagnosis that required two tracheotomies.

Title: Here's an exclusive look at the pitch deck AI tax startup Incentify used to raise $9.5 million
Description: Enterprise startup Incentify raised a $9.5 million Series A funding round and uses AI to help companies find tax credits and incentives.

Title: China's EV battery titan is coming for Europe
Description: CATL is expanding in Europe — and the recent collapse of Northvolt, the Swedish battery maker that burnt through $15 billion, could smooth its path.

Title: I had my daughter at 19 and needed to go on welfare. Now, we run a million-dollar business together.
Description:
Traci Szemkus had her daughter when she was 19.
She went on welfare, including food stamps.
In 2024 her business with her daughter broke $1 million.

Title: Cheating on tech interviews is soaring. Managers don't know what to do.
Description: A 'perfect storm' has made coding interviews a cheater's paradise

Title: The day a Russian missile hit a Ukrainian tech giant
Description:
Every entrepreneur has to overcome obstacles, but few have faced the challenges of Oleksandr Kosovan.
As the founder and CEO of Ukrainian scaleup MacPaw, Kosovan runs his business in a country under invasion.
The company has even been hit by missile barrages.…

Title: A Century-Long Battle Over the Census is Brewing
Description:
In the 1920s, nativists lawmakers introduced “citizen-only” reapportionment bills.
Then, a bipartisan coalition emerged to fight back.

Title: Liberal Judge Beats Musk-Backed Challenger in High-Stakes Wisconsin Supreme Court Race
Description: Susan Crawford, who led legal fights to protect union power and abortion rights and to oppose voter ID, defeated Republican-backed Brad Schimel in a race that became a proxy fight for the nation’s political battles.

Title: Inside one prospect's 'storybook' journey from Egypt to the NFL draft
Description: Despite initial language barriers and a lack of football knowledge, Ahmed Hassanein is close to becoming the first Egyptian to be drafted in the NFL.

Title: What is User-generated Content (UGC)? Essentials for a Soaring Strategy
Description:

And as I type this, I hear the former saying, “Uh, what is UGC?”

Description: The Nintendo Switch 2 Direct reveal event is today, and here at Digital Trends we’ll have all the Switch 2 news as it happens, live.

Title: Move fast, break things: A review of Abundance by Ezra Klein and Derek Thompson

Title: Samsung's latest Galaxy Tab S10 FE tablets are bigger and brighter than ever

Title: What Is ‘Squirting’? The Science behind the Controversial Phenomenon Explained
Description:
A mysterious and often debated aspect of human sexuality colloquially known as “squirting” sparks controversy.

Title: iOS 18.4 appears to be restoring deleted apps and installing new ones
